GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.18.10
GSD.description:
net: tun: unlink NAPI from device on destruction

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.10 by commit 8661d4b8faa2f7ee7a559969c0a7c57f077b1728, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 943170998b200190f99d3fe7e771437e2c51f319. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: tun: unlink NAPI from device on destruction
